text: Læa cea ca hen phwk khea thuk na ma khang hnafi nrk phwk khea ca thxmtaw lng xyang na sangwech mxng du xyang hlb sayta læa brrda phu sraththa ca klaw wa thæcring phwk thi khadthun khux brrda phu thi thataw khxng phwk khea læa khrxbkhraw khxng phwk khea hı seiyhay yabyein nı wan ki ya mahˌ phung thrab theid thæcring brrda phu xthrrm nan xyu nı kar lngthosʹ xan thawr
